oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DUAL BAND SPACE-FED MICROSTRIP ANTENNA ARRAYS WITH ORTHOGONAL POLARIZATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHIDE, R
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dual-band antenna arrays
microstrip antenna arrays
space-fed arrays
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A high gain dual band microstrip antenna array with orthogonal polarization is proposed using space-fed configuration. The feed network in the array is eliminated which improves the efficiency. Simulated and measured results are presented. (C) 2011 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Microwave Opt Technol Lett 53:793-795, 2011; View this article online at wileyonlinelibrary.com. DOI 10.1002/mop.25851
